mapper.select: SELECT point_pk, user_pk, point, date, type, description, CASE DAYOFWEEK(date) WHEN 1 THEN '일' WHEN 2 THEN '월' WHEN 3 THEN '화' WHEN 4 THEN '수' WHEN 5 THEN '목' WHEN 6 THEN '금' WHEN 7 THEN '토' END AS day FROM point WHERE user_pk = #{userPk} ORDER BY date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point (user_pk, point, date, type, description) VALUES (#{userPk}, #{point}, NOW(), #{type}, #{description})
mapper.select: SELECT rl.reservelist_pk AS reservelistPk, rl.user_pk AS userPk, rl.game_pk AS gamePk, rl.paid_amount AS paidAmount, rl.predict AS predict, g.result AS result, u.total_point AS totalPoint FROM reservation_list rl JOIN games g ON rl.game_pk = g.game_pk JOIN user u ON rl.user_pk = u.user_pk WHERE rl.is_pay = 1 AND rl.is_cancel = 0 AND rl.predict IS NOT NULL AND rl.is_earn = 0 AND g.result IS NOT NULL AND g.result != 'CANCEL'
